item.title: How to Block Spam Texts on iPhone
item.description: Unsolicited text messages can be really annoying. If your iPhone is being bombarded with spam text messages you need some way to get rid of them. iPhones do not offer a built in solution for blocking spam texts. In order to block them, you will need to use a third-party app. Install Dont Text Dont Text makes it simple to block spam texts messages on your iPhone. To get started, download Dont Text from the App Store for free.
